item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Glad to hear. I think most users aren't aware of the whole "execute as admin" so they think it doesn't work. Appreciate the heads up!
item.content:encoded: Glad to hear. I think most users aren’t aware of the whole “execute as admin” so they think it doesn’t work. Appreciate the heads up!

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Thanks for your help Ben! I really appreciate it :)
item.content:encoded: Thanks for your help Ben! I really appreciate it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: PericlesBaduk
item.dc:creator: PericlesBaduk
item.description: sidenote: Some website claim (yutopian) that the program can't be run on Win7 and presumably win8. They are wrong. Indeed, you may get an error warning, you just have to right click > execute as adminitrator to run it. Works perfectly here :)
item.content:encoded: sidenote: Some website claim (yutopian) that the program can’t be run on Win7 and presumably win8. They are wrong. Indeed, you may get an error warning, you just have to right click > execute as adminitrator to run it. Works perfectly here ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: PericlesBaduk
item.dc:creator: PericlesBaduk
item.description: I recommend a small "Tesuji " and shape training program named "Tesuji made easy". Problems are all about shapes, connection tesujis, and such, sorted by category (cutting / yose / and so on) It's my favourite software, by far. I 've almost only used it for the past 10 years
item.content:encoded: I recommend a small “Tesuji ” and shape training program named “Tesuji made easy”. Problems are all about shapes, connection tesujis, and such, sorted by category (cutting / yose / and so on) It’s my favourite software, by far. I ‘ve almost only used it for the past 10 years
